mapper.sql: ID, Job, JobName, Name, PeopleID, PeopleGender, PeopleSn, JoinMatchLIst, JoinMatchListInName, gage, Pinlv, isTeamMatchList, teamId,matchid,matchname,joinwhichjointeam,score1,score2,score3,teamname
mapper.select: select * from join_match_team_people where peopleid=#{arg0} and matchid=#{arg1}

SELECT j.ID, j.Job, j.JobName, j.Name, j.PeopleID, j.PeopleGender, j.PeopleSn, j.JoinMatchLIst, j.JoinMatchListInName, j.gage, j.Pinlv, j.isTeamMatchList, j.teamId,j.matchid,j.matchname,j.joinwhichjointeam,j.score1,j.score2,j.score3,j.teamname FROM join_match_team_people AS j, join_match_team AS jt WHERE j.joinwhichjointeam=jt.ID and j.Job=3 and jt.ID=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT j.ID, j.Job, j.JobName, j.Name, j.PeopleID, j.PeopleGender, j.PeopleSn, j.JoinMatchLIst, j.JoinMatchListInName, j.gage, j.Pinlv, j.isTeamMatchList, j.teamId,j.matchid,j.matchname,j.joinwhichjointeam,j.score1,j.score2,j.score3,j.teamname FROM join_match_team_people AS j, join_match_team AS jt WHERE j.joinwhichjointeam=jt.ID and j.Job=1 and jt.ID=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT j.ID, j.Job, j.JobName, j.Name, j.PeopleID, j.PeopleGender, j.PeopleSn, j.JoinMatchLIst, j.JoinMatchListInName, j.gage, j.Pinlv, j.isTeamMatchList, j.teamId,j.matchid,j.matchname,j.joinwhichjointeam,j.score1,j.score2,j.score3,j.teamname FROM join_match_team_people AS j, join_match_team as jt
WHERE j.matchid =#{arg0} and j.joinwhichjointeam=jt.ID and j.JoinMatchLIst=#{arg1} and jt.IsConfirm=2

SELECT j.ID, j.Job, j.JobName, j.Name, j.PeopleID, j.PeopleGender, j.PeopleSn, j.JoinMatchLIst, j.JoinMatchListInName, j.gage, j.Pinlv, j.isTeamMatchList, j.teamId,j.matchid,j.matchname,j.joinwhichjointeam,j.score1,j.score2,j.score3,j.teamname FROM join_match_team_people AS j, join_match_team as jt WHERE j.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND j.joinwhichjointeam = jt.id and jt.IsConfirm=2 and JoinMatchLIst=8

WHERE j.matchid = #{arg0}

SELECT j.ID, j.Job, j.JobName, j.Name, j.PeopleID, j.PeopleGender, j.PeopleSn, j.JoinMatchLIst, j.JoinMatchListInName, j.gage, j.Pinlv, j.isTeamMatchList, j.teamId,j.matchid,j.matchname,j.joinwhichjointeam,j.score1,j.score2,j.score3,j.teamname FROM join_match_team_people AS j, join_match_team AS jt, hx_people AS h WHERE j.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND j.joinwhichjointeam = jt.id AND h.SN = j.PeopleSn AND jt.isconfirm=2

update join_match_team_people
Job = #{job,jdbcType=INTEGER},

Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
